cont.entity_a: Easy to use with clear instructions.
cont.entity_b: Recommended for both beginners and experienced canners.

cont.entity_a: Can be used on glass top ranges.

cont.entity_b: Durable and reliable, with no rubber gaskets to replace.

cont.entity_b: Can double stack pints and hold up to 19 quarts.

cont.entity_b: Reported with missing parts and unhelpful responses.
